mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Boggess, Caleb
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Marion Co., VA [Marion County, West Virginia]
Worthington, Marion Co., VA [Worthington, Marion County, West Virginia]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Boggess, Caleb Patient Age: 22. Marital Status: Married. Diagnosis: Gun shot wound of left shoulder. Bullet entering 1/2 inch above middlle 3rd of clavicle. Direction inwards and backwards to exit 1/2 inch to the left of 3 dorsal vertebra grazing transverse process of the vertebra. Location Wounded: In act[ion] at Winchester, Va. Date Wounded: 1864/07/20. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Transferred to USA General Hospital Grafton West Virginia, 1864/09/24.
